content: Please note that this Football Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of hilarious' Premier League pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405399.0Southampton + Arsenal + São Paulo FC SaturdayFootball Prediction Contest!Game 1:  Arsenal v Tottenhamhttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/arsenal-fc-v-tottenham-hotspur-631b56c7fe499a10e41dfee9Game 2:  Southampton v Evertonhttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/southampton-fc-v-everton-fc-631b56d0d5ab6332f6dff707Game 3:  São Paulo FC v Independiente del Vallehttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/international-clubs/copa-sudamericana/sao-paulo-fc-sp-v-csd-independiente-del-valle-631b0aa5a9ea9d14a3cc7db7Rulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  20'  2-0 ArsenalGame 2:  20'  2-0 SouthamptonGame 3:  20'  1-0 São Paulo FCPrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free Bet!If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mbtc!(Small print) *The declared winners are final and up to my discretion*
